Class Student

  • java.lang.Object
    • Student
  • public class Student
extends java.lang.Object
    The Student class represents a student in a student administration system. It holds the student details relevant in our context.
    Version:
    2.0 26/10/2021
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling and David Barnes, Modified by Derek Peacock & Nicholas Day, Leighton Burgoyne

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Student()
      This constructor creates a new student with a fixed name and id.
      Student​(java.lang.String name, int id)
      Create a new student with a given name and ID number.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addMark​(ModuleMark mark)
      Associates the student with a specific ModuleMark entry.
      void awardMark​(java.lang.String moduleCode, int markInput)
      Find the module by the moduleCode and set its mark to the value
      void awardTestMarks()
      Award a different pass mark for each of the modules on the enrolled course for testing purposes.
      void enrol​(Course course)
      Set the Student onto a specific course (enrol)
      int getID()
      Return the student ID of this student.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the full name of this student.
      void print()
      Print the student's name and ID number to the output terminal.
      void printCourse()
      Prints out Course Information from the course class, including modules and course codes.
      void printTranscript()
      Prints the Student Transcript showing full course data and the associated modules and grade data on an individual basis.
